description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年名相、凌烟阁二十四功臣之一。以善于谋略著称，与杜如晦并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A prominent chancellor of the early Tang dynasty and one of the 24 meritorious officials of Lingyan Pavilion. He was known for his strategic planning and is often mentioned with Du Ruhui as 'Fang's schemes and Du's judgment'.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个重要朝代，房玄龄在此期间担任宰相等重要职务。
description.en: An important dynasty in Chinese history, during which Fang Xuanling served in key positions such as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第二位皇帝，为秦王时招揽房玄龄为其重要谋士，后在玄武门之变后即位。
description.en: The second emperor of the Tang dynasty. As the Prince of Qin, he recruited Fang Xuanling as a key advisor and later ascended to the throne after the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由时任秦王的李世民在长安太极宫玄武门附近发动的一场政变，房玄龄是其中的重要策划者。
description.en: A coup d'état launched by Li Shimin, then Prince of Qin, near Xuanwu Gate of the Taiji Palace in Chang'an. Fang Xuanling was a key planner of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年名相，以处事果断著称，与房玄龄并称“房谋杜断”，二人为李世民的得力助手。
description.en: A prominent chancellor of the early Tang dynasty, known for his decisiveness. He is often mentioned with Fang Xuanling as 'Fang's schemes and Du's judgment'; they were key assistants to Li Shimin.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年宰相、外戚，在玄武门之变中与房玄龄等人并功第一。
description.en: A chancellor and imperial relative of the early Tang dynasty, who, along with Fang Xuanling and others, was ranked first in merit for his role in the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年名将，在玄武门之变中与房玄龄等人并功第一。
description.en: A famous general of the early Tang dynasty, who, along with Fang Xuanling and others, was ranked first in merit for his role in the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初年将领，在玄武门之变中与房玄龄等人并功第一。
description.en: A general of the early Tang dynasty, who, along with Fang Xuanling and others, was ranked first in merit for his role in the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄之父，隋朝官员，曾任泾阳县令、司隶刺史。
description.en: Father of Fang Xuanling, an official in the Sui dynasty who served as Magistrate of Jingyang County and Inspector of the Capital Province.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄的曾祖父，北魏镇远将军、宋安郡太守。
description.en: Great-grandfather of Fang Xuanling, served as General Zhenyuan and Administrator of Song'an Commandery in the Northern Wei dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄的祖父。
description.en: Grandfather of Fang Xuanling.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄次子，高阳公主的丈夫，后因谋反案被处死。
description.en: Second son of Fang Xuanling and husband of Princess Gaoyang. He was later executed in connection with a rebellion plot.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民之女，房遗爱之妻，后因谋反案被赐自尽。
description.en: Daughter of Emperor Taizong of Tang and wife of Fang Yiai. She was later ordered to commit suicide in connection with a rebellion plot.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗永徽年间，房玄龄之子房遗爱与妻子高阳公主被指控图谋发动宫廷政变，最终导致多人被杀或流放的政治事件。此事件也导致房玄龄配享太庙的待遇被停止。
description.en: During the Yonghui era of Emperor Gaozong of Tang, Fang Xuanling's son Fang Yiai and his wife Princess Gaoyang were accused of plotting a palace coup, a political event that resulted in the execution or exile of many individuals. This incident also led to the cessation of Fang Xuanling's posthumous honor of being enshrined in the Imperial Ancestral Temple.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄的嗣子，因受房遗爱谋反案牵连，被贬为铜陵尉。
description.en: The heir of Fang Xuanling, who was implicated in Fang Yiai's rebellion case and demoted to the post of Wei of Tongling.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄的妻子，以刚烈闻名。唐太宗欲赐美人给房玄龄，卢氏宁死不从，饮下“毒酒”以明志。
description.en: Fang Xuanling's wife, known for her strong will. When Emperor Taizong wanted to gift concubines to Fang Xuanling, she refused to the point of death, drinking 'poisoned wine' to show her resolve.

description.zh-cn: 中国的二十四史之一，由唐朝房玄龄等人奉敕监修。
description.en: One of the Twenty-Four Histories of China, compiled under imperial order with Fang Xuanling as the chief editor during the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，曾召见房玄龄之妻卢氏，劝其接受太宗为房玄龄所赐的美人。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Taizong of Tang. She summoned Fang Xuanling's wife, Lady Lu, to persuade her to accept the concubines gifted to Fang Xuanling by the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中央机构中书省的长官，为宰相之一。
description.en: The head of the Central Secretariat (Zhongshu Sheng) in the Tang dynasty's central government, one of the chancellors.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中央机构尚书省的长官之一，为宰相之一。
description.en: One of the heads of the Department of State Affairs (Shangshu Sheng) in the Tang dynasty's central government, one of the chancellors.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官名，位列三公，为荣誉性职位。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title, one of the Three Excellencies, holding a position of great honor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的爵位之一，房玄龄于贞观十一年受封此爵位。
description.en: A noble title in the Tang dynasty, which was conferred upon Fang Xuanling in the eleventh year of the Zhenguan era.

en: Twenty-four meritorious officials of Lingyan Pavilion

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗为表彰功臣而命画家阎立本在凌烟阁内描绘的二十四位功臣的画像，房玄龄名列其中。
description.en: A group of twenty-four meritorious officials of the early Tang dynasty, whose portraits were commissioned by Emperor Taizong to be painted by Yan Liben in the Lingyan Pavilion to honor their contributions. Fang Xuanling was among them.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄在隋末投靠时为秦王的李世民，为其参谋划策，典管书记，是其得力的谋士之一，并在李世民即位后长期担任宰相。
description.en: Fang Xuanling joined Li Shimin, then the Prince of Qin, at the end of the Sui dynasty, serving as his strategist and secretary. He was one of Li Shimin's most capable advisors and served as chancellor for a long period after Li Shimin ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄是唐朝初年的开国功臣和名相。
description.en: Fang Xuanling was a founding father and prominent chancellor of the early Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄参与策划了玄武门之变，并与杜如晦、长孙无忌、尉迟敬德、侯君集五人并功第一。
description.en: Fang Xuanling participated in planning the Xuanwu Gate Incident and was ranked first in merit along with Du Ruhui, Zhangsun Wuji, Yuchi Jingde, and Hou Junji.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄与杜如晦同为唐太宗的得力助手，房玄龄善于谋划，杜如晦善于决断，二人并称“房谋杜断”，后世将他们视为良相的典范。
description.en: Fang Xuanling and Du Ruhui were both key assistants to Emperor Taizong. Fang was skilled in planning while Du excelled at making decisions. They were known as 'Fang's schemes and Du's judgment' and are regarded by later generations as model chancellors.

description.zh-cn: 在玄武门之变中，房玄龄与长孙无忌、杜如晦等人并功第一。
description.en: In the Xuanwu Gate Incident, Fang Xuanling, along with Zhangsun Wuji, Du Ruhui, and others, was ranked first in merit.

description.zh-cn: 在玄武门之变中，房玄龄与尉迟敬德、杜如晦等人并功第一。
description.en: In the Xuanwu Gate Incident, Fang Xuanling, along with Yuchi Jingde, Du Ruhui, and others, was ranked first in merit.

description.zh-cn: 在玄武门之变中，房玄龄与侯君集、杜如晦等人并功第一。
description.en: In the Xuanwu Gate Incident, Fang Xuanling, along with Hou Junji, Du Ruhui, and others, was ranked first in merit.

description.zh-cn: 房彦谦是房玄龄的父亲。
description.en: Fang Yanqian was the father of Fang Xuanling.

description.zh-cn: 房熊是房彦谦的父亲。
description.en: Fang Xiong was the father of Fang Yanqian.

description.zh-cn: 房翼是房熊的父亲。
description.en: Fang Yi was the father of Fang Xiong.

description.zh-cn: 房遗爱是房玄龄的次子。
description.en: Fang Yiai was the second son of Fang Xuanling.

description.zh-cn: 房遗直是房玄龄的嗣子。
description.en: Fang Yizhi was the heir of Fang Xuanling.

description.zh-cn: 房遗爱与高阳公主为夫妻。
description.en: Fang Yiai and Princess Gaoyang were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 房遗爱因谋反案被处死。
description.en: Fang Yiai was executed due to the rebellion case.

description.zh-cn: 高阳公主因谋反案被赐自尽。
description.en: Princess Gaoyang was ordered to commit suicide due to the rebellion case.

description.zh-cn: 房遗直受房遗爱谋反案连累，被贬为铜陵尉。
description.en: Fang Yizhi was implicated in Fang Yiai's rebellion case and was demoted to the post of Wei of Tongling.

description.zh-cn: 因其子房遗爱谋反，房玄龄配享太庙的待遇被停止。
description.en: Due to his son Fang Yiai's rebellion, Fang Xuanling's posthumous honor of being enshrined in the Imperial Ancestral Temple was revoked.

description.zh-cn: 卢氏是房玄龄的妻子。
description.en: Lady Lu was Fang Xuanling's wife.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄奉唐太宗之命，监修了《晋书》。
description.en: Under the order of Emperor Taizong of Tang, Fang Xuanling supervised the compilation of the Book of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗欲赐美人给房玄龄，遭其妻卢氏坚决反对。太宗以毒酒试探，卢氏一饮而尽，太宗因而感慨“我尚畏见，何况于玄龄！”
description.en: Emperor Taizong wanted to gift concubines to Fang Xuanling, but his wife Lady Lu strongly opposed it. The emperor tested her with 'poisoned wine', which she drank without hesitation, leading the emperor to exclaim, 'Even I am afraid of her, let alone Xuanling!'

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗为赐房玄龄美人一事，让长孙皇后召见卢氏进行劝说。
description.en: Regarding the matter of gifting concubines to Fang Xuanling, Emperor Taizong had Empress Zhangsun summon Lady Lu to persuade her.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民即位后，房玄龄出任中书令。
description.en: After Emperor Taizong of Tang ascended the throne, Fang Xuanling was appointed as Zhongshu Ling (Head of the Central Secretariat).

description.zh-cn: 贞观三年（629年），房玄龄迁任尚书左仆射。
description.en: In the third year of Zhenguan (629), Fang Xuanling was transferred to the position of Shangshu Zuo Puye (Left Executive of the Department of State Affairs).

description.zh-cn: 贞观十六年（642年），房玄龄进位司空。
description.en: In the sixteenth year of Zhenguan (642), Fang Xuanling was promoted to the position of Sikong (Minister of Works).

description.zh-cn: 贞观十一年（637年），房玄龄受封为梁国公。
description.en: In the eleventh year of Zhenguan (637), Fang Xuanling was ennobled as the Duke of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄名列凌烟阁二十四功臣之一。
description.en: Fang Xuanling was listed as one of the Twenty-four meritorious officials of Lingyan Pavilion.
